text: Mireille Dittmann (born 10 January 1974) is a former professional tennis player from Australia. ==Biography== A right-handed player from Victoria, Dittmann had a career high singles ranking of 197. Dittmann qualified for the main draw of two WTA Tour tournaments in 2001, at Bali and Shanghai. She featured in the Shanghai main draw again in 2002 and lost her first round match to Anna Kournikova, in front of a large centre court crowd who had come to see the high profile Russian. In the 2002 season she competed in the qualifying draws of all four grand slam tournaments. == ITF finals == ===Singles (2–8)=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%;" width=15% |-
